name: portos
description: Local dev machine App OS portal
author: Adam Eivy (@antic|@atomantic)

scripts.start: npm run build && node ./node_modules/pm2/bin/pm2 delete ecosystem.config.cjs --silent; node ./node_modules/pm2/bin/pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && npm run setup
scripts.update: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && npm run setup && npm run setup:ghostty
